attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: this is a load of rubbish, tequnikally father christmas is an illegal immagrant from lapland. It is not neccisarry for children to admire someone who is not from full british status, they should be brought up with realits of life, todays commercialism has ruined the basis of our modern society.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
